soundEditor.sound.description: Lable for the name of the sound

soundEditor.play.description: Title of the button to start playing the sound

soundEditor.stop.description: Title of the button to stop the sound

soundEditor.trim.description: Title of the button to start trimminging the sound

soundEditor.save.description: Title of the button to save trimmed sound

soundEditor.undo.description: Title of the button to undo

soundEditor.redo.description: Title of the button to redo

soundEditor.faster.description: Title of the button to apply the faster effect

soundEditor.slower.description: Title of the button to apply the slower effect

soundEditor.echo.description: Title of the button to apply the echo effect

soundEditor.robot.description: Title of the button to apply the robot effect

soundEditor.louder.description: Title of the button to apply the louder effect

soundEditor.softer.description: Title of the button to apply thr.softer effect

soundEditor.reverse.description: Title of the button to apply the reverse effect

contextMenu.delete.description: Menu item to delete in the right click menu

targetPane.addSprite.description: Button to add a sprite in the target pane

targetPane.addBackdrop.description: Button to add a backdrop in the target pane

stageSelector.backdrops.description: Label for the backdrops in the stage selector

controls.turboMode.description: Label indicating turbo mode is active

action.addBackdrop.description: Button to add a backdrop in the editor tab

action.addCostume.description: Button to add a costume in the editor tab

action.recordSound.description: Button to record a sound in the editor tab

action.addSound.description: Button to add a sound in the editor tab
